description: Shared Services Canada (SSC) has a requirement for Encrypted external 8Tb SSD drives, for the Department of National Defence.
full_summary:
=====================

**Request for Proposal: Encrypted External 8Tb SSD Drives**

**Notice ID: SSC-24-00027653:T**

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of Encrypted external 8Tb SSD drives for the Department of National Defence. The requirement is to deliver the drives to a location in Nova Scotia.

**Bid Submission**

Prospective suppliers must submit bids electronically to the Contracting Authority's email. Faxed and hardcopy bids will not be accepted, except in exceptional circumstances.

**Evaluation Criteria**

The bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for contract award. The bidder must submit pricing in accordance with Annex A – List of Deliverables and Pricing.

**Key Documents**

Refer to the Request for Quotations document for complete details, including:

* Mandatory criteria
* Evaluation criteria
* Basis of selection

**Language**

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information**

For further information, please contact:

Raiyane Benchekroun
Phone: 613 324 4061
Fax: (613) 960-6007
Email: None
Address: Raiyane Benchekroun, 400 Cooper

**Related Attachments**

The attachments to this notice are available for download at:
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/E13F1A84-5FD4-4B6D-85DB-B16F12C2A9BA (English)
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download_public/D22FB762-5D16-4107-BD45-95C3DE6E1409 (French)

**Importance Notice**

The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Categories and UNSPSC Codes**

* GSIN: *N7025401
* UNSPSC: None

** Regions of Delivery**

Nova Scotia

**Publication and Closing Dates**

* Publication Date: 2024-09-19
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-10-03T14:00:00

**Accords and Appliances**

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Language and Region**

* English and French are the official languages of Canada.
* Canada is the region of opportunity.

**Contact Entity and End-user Entities**

* Contracting Entity:
